params.rootKey: The key to act on your behalf
params.wallet: The wallet who issued the linking
The wallet who issued the link

returns.delegates: addresses Array root keys for a given wallet

params.value: Whether to enable or disable linking for this address

checkLinkForAll(address,address).notice: Returns true if the root key is linked to a wallet

getLinksByRootKey(address).notice: Get all links for a given rootKey

getLinksForAll(address).notice: Returns an array of root keys for a given wallet

revokeAllLinks().notice: Revoke all root keys for a given wallet
